# hunting for quarries and destinations is handled by _gen_parabola_hunting.txt
# (which is generated by ../hunting.py) as well as parabola_wrappers.txt.
# Other base camp stuff
Sneak away from your wounds
￼ Wounds is dropping… (-3 CP)
Fertilise the tree with screams
￼ You've lost 5 x Aeolian Scream
  You've gained 1 x Parabolan Tree Season
Fertilise the tree with bone
  You've lost 1100 x Bone Fragments
  You've gained 1 x Parabolan Tree Season
Pick a fruit from the tree
￼ You've gained 1 x Parabolan Orange-apple
  You've lost 1 x Parabolan Tree Season
# Dome of Scales
Offer a habitation to one of the smaller Fingerkings
￼ You've lost 1 x Cheerful Goldfish
￼ You've gained 1 x Possessed Goldfish
￼ You've gained 1 x Favours: Fingerkings (up to 7)
Offer a habitation to a moderate-sized Fingerking
￼ You've lost 1 x Lucky Weasel
￼ You've gained 1 x Favours: Fingerkings (up to 7)
￼ You've gained 1 x Weasel of Social Discomfiture
Offer a habitation to seven very small Fingerkings
￼ You've lost 1 x Seven-Throated Warbler
￼ You've gained 1 x Forty-Nine-Voiced Warbler
Offer the Storm-bird to Fingerkings
￼ You've gained 4 x Incisive Observation
Furnish the Fingerkings with a Lizard
￼ You've gained 1 x Favours: Fingerkings (up to 7)
￼ You've lost 1 x Reprehensible Lizard
￼ You've gained 1 x Viric Lizard
Develop a more extensive connection with the Fingerkings
￼ You've lost 7 x Favours: Fingerkings
￼ You've gained 1 x Connected: Fingerkings
￼ You've lost 1 x Parabolan Orange-apple
# Viric Jungle
Steep your suit in the colours of the Viric jungle
￼ You've gained 1 x Viric Suit
￼ You've lost 1 x Parabola-Linen Suit
￼ You've lost 3 x Favours: Fingerkings
Steep your gown in the colours of the Viric jungle
￼ You've lost 1 x Parabola-Linen Frock
￼ You've lost 3 x Favours: Fingerkings
￼ You've gained 1 x Viric Frock
#Present a vision of Saint Aegidius the Less, Patron of Snails
# ￼ You've gained 2 x Verse of Counter-Creed
# eats skeleton
Inspire her to imagine His Amused Lordship as a historical figure
￼ You've gained 1 x Comprehensive Bribe
￼ You've lost 20 x Final Breath
# The Chessboard TODO
# The Waswood -- Action cost alway 3 (Go, Interact, Leave)
Reach towards the shore (Airs of Parabola 0-49)
  Action Cost: 3
￼ You've gained 0.5 x Ambiguous Eolith
￼ You've gained 0.5 x Knob of Scintillack
￼ You've gained 0.75 x Correspondence Plaque
￼ You've gained 0.75 x Relic of the Third City
￼ You've gained 0.25 x Solacefruit
Reach towards the shore (Airs of Parabola 50-100)
  Action Cost: 3
￼ You've gained 0.5 x Carved Ball of Stygian Ivory
￼ You've gained 0.5 x Unprovenanced Artefact
￼ You've gained 0.75 x Relic of the Second City
￼ You've gained 0.75 x Relic of the Fourth City
￼ You've gained 0.25 x Royal-Blue Feather
Compose a Revisionist History
  Action Cost: 3
￼ You've gained 1 x Revisionist Historical Narrative
￼ You've lost 1 x Incisive Observation
￼ You've lost 2 x Extraordinary Implication
Compose a Corrective History
  Action Cost: 3
  You've gained 0.9 x Corrective Historical Narrative
￼ You've lost 1.8 x An Identity Uncovered!
